office: 11th President of the Philippines ,  2nd President of the Fourth Republic , 1st President of the Fifth Republic
children: Ma. Elena Aquino-Cruz (eldest daughter) , Aurora Corazon Aquino-Abellada (eldest daughter) , Benigno S. Aquino III (middle son), Victoria Elisa Aquino-Dee (fourth daughter), Kristina Bernadette Aquino (youngest daughter)
alma_mater: St. Scholastica's College, College of Mount Saint Vincent, New York,  Far Eastern University
